meanings.sent1: Leaving the gate open periled the safety of the animals.
meanings.sent2: The hiker periled his life by venturing into the deep forest alone.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting to bring an umbrella periled her hairdo in the rain.
meanings.sent4: His reckless driving periled the lives of everyone on the road.
meanings.sent5: Ignoring the warning signs periled their chances of survival in the wilderness.

meanings.definition: In danger of being harmed or destroyed.
meanings.sent1: The old bridge was periled and could collapse at any moment.
meanings.sent2: The periled ship struggled to stay afloat in the stormy sea.
meanings.sent3: The periled castle was in need of urgent repairs to prevent collapse.
meanings.sent4: The periled species faced extinction due to habitat loss.
meanings.sent5: The periled city was evacuated before the hurricane hit to ensure safety.
